description: NVIDIA Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause a pointer dereference of an untrusted value, which may lead to denial of service.

product.name: NVIDIA GPU Display driver, vGPU driver, and Cloud gaming driver

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All versions prior to and including 13.8, 15.3, 16.1 and all versions prior to and including September 2023 release
